name: Peggy Goble
text: The pizza is pretty good but the last time I was there, I asked for extra cheese and was told I could not have it.  I offered to pay extra and was still told no.  The lady making was pizza was not very friendly.  Not sure I will go back to that location.

name: Benefitta Boss
text: I have pizzas made here almost every week. I do not cook on Fridays. A freshly prepared dinner that I dont have to fuss over & the children can bake when they're ready to. My family loves them.

name: Pedro Sanchez
text:
I loved papa Murphy’s
Better ingredients sadly they went out of business

name: Terri Lienhard
text: Veggie supreme delete is a really yummy pizza! Staff was friendly.

name: Mac Atac
text: Better than average pizza at very low prices.

name: Kathy butler
text: Great Pizza. Even my great nephew who is 2 years old kept saying yummy every time he took a bite.

name: Rachel Faller
text: Nice staff, love the pizza. Love that I don't have to spend a lot of money to get awesome pizza. By far the least greasy pizza you can buy.

name: Skills-USA Houston High School
text: Loved it! Great pizza; great service; just the best place in world! Nice and clean! This girl is happy after my latest visit there

name: Sean Stanhill
text: Super friendly staff who took noticeable pride in getting our pretty complicated order right over the phone. They were very busy inside at the time of pickup but made time for us. Felt very well taken care of.

name: missey hayes
text: I have Always had great service and we love the food.  Tonight I was in a bind and needed 2 pizzas at 8:00( closing time). I called on my way to place the order and they took care of me. They could have said no but they didn't. We have been …More

name: Real Life With Ashley King
text: Every visit is always like the first. Delicious!! No complaints. Great customer service!

name: Mariah Salim
text: Everyone is very friendly and it's always delicious and they have great specials!

name: Dianna Steiger
text: Really nice staff and the pizza and cheesy breadsticks are amazing. The stuffed pizza is what took us there and it is what brings us back again and again.

name: drew renshaw
text: My favorite pizza place. Get the Artichoke Bacon Chicken - fantastic.

name: Toy Daniel-Nunnally
text: Fresh salad, good pizza, yummy deserts.. great price!!!

name: Elizabeth Nelson
text: Always made fresh daily!!

name: Viola Greer
text: I love their gourmet veggie pizza

name: Pollyann Triplett
text: Greatness

name: Clarence Mainor
text: GREAT pizza

name: MEOW KITTY
text: Love the Tuesday special

name: Cindy C
text: I like their pizzas.

name: David Richardson
text: Always great at this location!!

name: Paul Allison
text: Best pizza around.

name: S F
text: Manager laughed twice when given the coupon from the Memphis city saver book they sell at schools ....pizza was $13, coupon $11value n still charged $7.50!  Tax in germantown sure is high or did he just pocket the difference?
